name: sensors-exercise
description: Read, parse and show environmental sensor data

scripts.template: jade client/*.jade -Po public && jade client/dashboard/*.jade -Po public/dashboard && jade client/upload-csv/*.jade -Po public/upload-csv
scripts.copy: cp client/styles/styles.css public/styles/styles.css && cp client/*.js public && cp -R client/dashboard/*.js public/dashboard && cp -R client/upload-csv/*.js public/upload-csv
scripts.build:front: npm run lint && npm run template && npm run copy
